TEI.2.document_type: Bill of Sale of a Slave
TEI.2.document_title: George B McKinstry to Stephen F Austin, 11-25-1836

barker_notes.barker_summary: Bill of Sale of a negro
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 462

div1.p: Bill of Sale of a negro

Be it Known. That in consideration of the Sum of twelve hundred dollars to me in hand paid the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, I have this day sold to Stephen F. Austin a certain Negro Man named Simon, of a dark complexion aged about twenty seven years I warrant the health as well the title to said Negro against the claim or claims of any person whatever, In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand in the Town of Columbia this 25th November 1836.
